description:
Twitter identity provider, let you register and set up permissions and authorization options for OAuth 2.0 protocol.

https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/authentication/guides/log-in-with-twitter

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Required. The client ID you received from Twitter when you registered.

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: Required. The client secret you received from Twitter for your Twitter App.

connectTimeout.title: HTTP Client connect timeout
connectTimeout.description: Duration of time in milliseconds that connects will block. (default 10000 ms)

maxPoolSize.title: HTTP Client max pool size
maxPoolSize.description: Maximum pool of connections can grow to. (default 200)
